name: Behind the Screen (itch) (JJ & Friends!)
description:
Did you know that inside every 2D Atari game, there's a 3D virtual world with a human secretly performing every action? Well, not quite. There's a 3D virtual world with a human secretly performing every action to help their digital A.I. friend.

This was made for GDKO Round 5. The challenge was to recreate a classic Atari game called "Leaper" in a unique style.

  • Controls: WASD to move, Mouse (or arrow keys) to look around, Space to jump, P for pause/settings, N to advance dialogue
  • Credits: Music from Pixabay, "Night Jazz Beats" by flybirdaudio. Textures are public domain (CC0), as well as from Unsplash
  • Browser: I recommend using Chrome. If you see issues on Firefox, try using fullscreen.

To learn more about the main character, play my GDKO Round 3 and Round 4 entry.
